text:
YouView, London, UK / permanent, full-time, on-site

YouView is looking for Test Automation developers. You'll be writing test scripts and working on our test infrastructure, much of which we open-source (e.g. http://stb-tester.com ).

We use a lot of shell & python, and a bit of C; but intelligence, the right attitude to automation (automate everything!), programming ability, and a focus on simple solutions are more important than experience with specific technologies. You could learn a lot about Unix here. Might also suit an experienced Linux sysadmin (with excellent shell scripting) looking to do more python programming.
